task.title: Add a Node
task.shortdesc: Describes how to add a node to your system.

context.p: If you want to increase your system’s capacity, you’ll want to add more nodes (NC servers). To add a node, perform the following tasks:

step.cmd: Log in to the CLC and enter the following command:
When prompted, enter the password to log into <nodeNameN>.
step.info: Eucalyptus requires this password to propagate the cryptographic keys.
